release.action: Added support for using MDC in AlternateSMTPAppender
AlternateSMTPAppender now handles the layour header as a PatternLayout and not as a static String anymore.
Updated log4j dependency to 1.2.15 with the necessary exclusion (1.2.15 brings in several optional/unwanted dependencies with maven)
Fixed a NPE in AlternateSMTPAppender (for exceptions with a null stacktrace)
Make it.openutils.log4j.AlternateSMTPAppender working properly also when no timeout is set (withot message aggregation).
new it.openutils.log4j.AlternateSMTPAppender that aggregates similar log messages.
